long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS IS AN AWESOME CHROME EXTENSION THAT PLAYS A LOOPING GIF OF VINCENT VEGA FROM PULP FICTION IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT OF YOUR SCREEN. THATS ALL IT DOES.
